name: winnowed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
winnow
to blow the chaff (= the outer coverings) from grain before it can be used as food
formal to reduce a large number of people or things to a much smaller number by judging their quality: A list of 15 applicants has been winnowed down to three. a winnowing process
